Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.profassignment

Class ProfessorAssignor

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.profassignment.ProfessorAssignor
public class ProfessorAssignor extends Object
The ProfessorAssignor can assign a professor to a player using the strategy in use It also contains the professor not assigned yet.
